Here is the list of signs at $LINE and their corresponding scores, along with a brief description:

2. Gemini - 7/10 - Geminis are curious and adaptable, but can also be scattered and unreliable.

5. Virgo - 8/10 - Virgos are analytical and hardworking, but can also be critical and perfectionistic.
6. Libra - 7/10 - Libras are diplomatic and social, but can also be indecisive and overly concerned with appearances.
7. Scorpio - 9/10 - Scorpios are passionate and intense, but can also be secretive and controlling.
8. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Sagittarians are adventurous and optimistic, but can also be reckless and blunt.
9. Capricorn - 6/10 - Capricorns are responsible and ambitious, but can also be rigid and overly serious.

Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics, not individual personalities or experiences.
